employees.name: Zachary Dupree
employees.description: Zack is a 2nd year Computer Science student and Resident Advisor at Bradley University. Zack enjoys coding projects that make life easier and simpler.

employees.name: Ryan Dodd
employees.description: Ryan is a 3rd year Computer Science student and Resident Advisor at Bradley University who loves programming. Ryan has experience developing in multiple areas, particularly with web and augmented reality. In his free time, Ryan enjoys rock climbing, reading, and creating new ideas.

employees.name: Duncan Carr
employees.description: Duncan is a 2nd year Mathematics student and Resident Advisor at Bradley University, with a hobby for programming. Duncan has experience with a variety of computer science topics, dabbling in whatever interests him at a given time. Duncan enjoys learning new things, cooking, and spending time with friends.

employees.name: Alexander Talbott
employees.description: Alexander is a UX designer, dedicated to ensuring the best possible experience for all users. He studied at Bradley University and has traveled the globe working for clients, making digital and physical products that put user needs first.

employees.name: JD de Beauvoir
employees.description: JD is a 2nd year Computer Science and Music student at Bradley University. He has experience with all kinds of software development, from full stack websites to Minecraft mods. He also plays the violin, and does gigs in his free time.

negativeTestimonials.name: Josh M
negativeTestimonials.description: Our supervisors don't even know how to use our current software

negativeTestimonials.name: Riley T
negativeTestimonials.description: Our current student app is just a website crammed into an app

negativeTestimonials.name: Jackson S
negativeTestimonials.description: I have to log in five times just to navigate our portal
